9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir narrated that:The Prophet was asked about whether Umrah was obligatory? He said: "No. But if you perform Umrah it is more virtuous

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْعُمْرَةِ أَوَاجِبَةٌ هِيَ أَمْ لاَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Umrah: Is It Required Or Not?
